tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE QualityControlData (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE,
    quality_score DECIMAL,
    manager_id INT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_manager_id FOREIGN KEY (manager_id) REFERENCES Managers(manager_id)
);
CREATE TABLE Managers (manager_id INT PRIMARY KEY, manager_name VARCHAR(50), department_id INT)

CREATE TABLE managers (
    manager_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    manager_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    report_data JSON
)

CREATE TABLE quality_control (
    qc_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id INT,
    qc_result TEXT,
    qc_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    report_date DATE,
    manager_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (manager_id) REFERENCES Managers(manager_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Trends (
    trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trend_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    trend_date DATE,
    qc_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (qc_id) REFERENCES QualityControl(qc_id)
);
